TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AlternateView extends System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase

summary.span: 表示电子邮件的查看格式。

span.span: Represents the format to view an email message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类可指定采用不同格式的电子邮件副本。Use the class to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果在 HTML 中发送消息，则可能还需要提供纯文本版本，以防某些收件人使用无法显示 HTML 内容的电子邮件读者。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 此类有两个属性 ， 用于解析电子邮件内容中的 url。This class has two properties and that are used to resolve URLs within the content of the email. 对象的集合 。 is a collection of objects. 呈现后，电子邮件内容中的 Url 将首先与集合中每个对象的 Url 相匹配 ，然后解决。When rendered, URLs within the email's content are first matched against the URLs in the of each object in the collection, and resolved. 邮件读取器使用来解析正文中的相对 Url，并 在集合中解析相对 url 。 is used by the mail reader to resolve relative URLs within the body, and also to resolve relative URLs, in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LinkedResources As LinkedResourceCollection

summary.span: 获取此附件引用的嵌入资源集。

span.span: Gets the set of embedded resources referred to by this attachment.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象存储将作为电子邮件的一部分发送的链接资源的集合。

span.span: A object that stores the collection of linked resources to be sent as part of an email message.
